name: Practical Tennis
description:
Enter the tennis dome.

Face The Machine.

Hit balls. All of the balls. Hit them for as long as you can.

Beat The Machine.

Features:

  • A mildly psychotic tennis ball dispenser
  • A racket floating in mid-air
  • Score keeping
  • Hidden power shot move
  • Low polygons for high performance tennis
  • Physics, the tennis equipment has some
  • Realistic sound effects
  • A jaunty musical accompaniment
